stories.text:
We’re excited to launch our free Livechat and No-code chatbot platform for modern go-to-market teams.

We’ve built it specifically for startups and growth companies. Helps you with faster sales and better engagement with customers

You can get started in 2 minutes! Zero training is needed for your team to use Jikoo.io

- It is indeed 100% free forever! No need to upgrade to a paid plan if you don’t require more than 2 users - Chatbots helps you generate leads, provide support to your customers even while you are sleeping! - Win more deals using Built-in CRM - Make your team 27% more productive by giving one 360 degree access to all customer data - An industry first, Live Chat ticketing system for faster resolution and team collaboration - One dashboard to monitor customer conversations + deal flow

Check out the Jikoo.io and share your comments below - happy to answer your queries throughout the day.

Please, use it and share your feedback with us
stories.title: Still using outdated Livechat? Here's a modern alternative
